repositories.name: ifreedmen-net
repositories.title: Community Network
repositories.description: Community hub for engagement, collaboration, directories, and events. Digital town hall for Freedmen worldwide. Static deploy via GitHub Pages.
repositories.copilot_prompt: Scaffold a static site with /content/directory, /content/events, /src, /config/nav.json. Seed 2 sample directory entries and 1 event. Include Pages workflow to deploy dist/. Open PR from scaffold/initial with checklist and labels scope:infra type:scaffold.

repositories.name: ifreedmen-info
repositories.title: Research & Education
repositories.description: Research/education portal: lineage guides, treaties, legal references. Static search index. Future API stubs for identity verification.
repositories.copilot_prompt: Create folders /content/treaties /content/lineage /content/legal /src/api (stubs) /config/search-index.json. Add 1 sample article with front-matter. Add Pages workflow to publish dist/. Open PR from scaffold/initial; include README explaining content model and search index.

repositories.name: ifreedmen-shop
repositories.title: Community Marketplace (Semi Nerd)
repositories.description: Open marketplace for Freedmen entrepreneurs and grassroots SaaS (Semi Nerd co-brand). Fee splits reinvested into the community. Next.js static export.
repositories.copilot_prompt: Init Next.js. Add /content/vendors and /content/products with JSON schemas, /config/commerce.json (5% platform, 3% reinvest). Build exports to dist (next build && next export). Add ProductCard and simple listing page. Add Pages workflow. PR from scaffold/initial.

repositories.name: ifreedmen-store
repositories.title: Internal Brand & Cultural Regalia
repositories.description: Official iFreedmen regalia store. Curated catalog, limited drops, cultural artifacts. Next.js static export for GitHub Pages.
repositories.copilot_prompt: Init Next.js with static export to dist. Add /content/products (curated SKUs) and /config/drops.json with one sample drop. Create simple grid, product page, and DropTimer component. Include Pages workflow and README. Open PR from scaffold/initial.
